text: Amjad Farid (Fareed) Sabri (23 December 1976 â€“ 22 June 2016) was a Pakistani singer. He became one of South Asia's most famous qawwali singers. He was murdered by a drive-by shooting on June 22, 2016. == Death == Ahjad Sabri was shot and killed in Karachi in a targeted killing by a splinter group of the Pakistani Taliban on 22 June 2016. He was 39 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1976 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths by firearm Category:Pakistani singers
title: Amjad Sabri
